text: Barnyard is a 2006 party game based on the animated movie of the same name. It has been released for the Nintendo GameCube, PlayStation 2, Game Boy Advance, PC, and the Wii. Category:2006 video games Category:THQ games Category:Game Boy Advance games Category:Nintendo GameCube games Category:Open-world video games Category:Party video games Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:Video games based on movies Category:Windows games Category:Wii games
title: Barnyard (video game)
